comment: She is an okay professor. Just takes a while to respond to emails, is pretty unorganized, and is decently strict with due dates. There is A LOT of reading and quizzes on that material the beginning of every class. The exams are easy, there is just a lot of busy work and writing essays.

I personally loved Dr. Rodriguez. There are quizzes every week and the class does have a lot of work. You will be doing a lot of work with children and be writing tons of essays. She will let you fix certain things to help your grade. Any questions I had, she always answered them. If you are overwhelmed, she will move dates around to help.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: I dont know why she has good reviews. She is one of the worst professors Ive ever had. She isnt organized at all. Shes rude and inconsiderate. Takes forever to answer emails. If you can take another teacher, take another teacher. If the opportunity ever presented itself, I would fight her.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: AMAZING! The best education professor at KSU. I wish I could take her for every class. She really teaches you and everything we do you will do later on as a teacher. I recommend hard copies of the textbooks bc it is easier to take to elem schools and do assignments with students. Make sure to keep of with field experience work and you will get an A
Dr. Rodriguez is a wonderful Professor. Highly recommend.

By far the best teacher I have had during my time at KSU. Each week I left class knowing I learned something that would benefit me in the future. You will learn so much from Professor Rodriguez. She teaches you how to assess students, create interactive lesson plans, and provide effective feedback. I wish I could take her again! Take her!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: She was okay, didn't seem organized sometimes. Boring.

AMAZING TEACHER! By far one of the greatest teachers I have had at kennesaw so far! She is always there for you will great feedback and understanding. Extremely helpful on the assignments that we do and works with you. Would definitely take her again for another class. Super sweet :)

Great professor! She is very sweet to the student's and is always open to talk to you about the class. We have reflections due every week and literature circles for the first half of the semester. She is flexible with due dates and will work with her students instead of rushing. She makes the whole 2 hours fun! TAKE HER!!!

This is the best education teacher I've had so far. I had her for both ECE3320 and ECE3330 and she is the head of the department for these classes. She is amazing at walking you through what is expected and breaks everything down so you aren't slammed with work. Something due every week, but she makes it so much easier on you. MUST TAKE HER!
